member.name: T:TrackableEntities.Common.EntityNavigationProperty
M:TrackableEntities.Common.EntityNavigationProperty.AsReferenceProperty``1
member.summary: Casts 'this' to EntityReferenceProperty<TEntity>. Returns an empty enumerable if 'this' is not a reference property or the entity type is incompatible.

member.summary: Shortcut: casts 'this' to EntityReferenceProperty.

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.Common.EntityNavigationProperty.AsCollectionProperty``1
member.summary: Casts 'this' to EntityCollectionProperty<TEntityCollection>. Returns an empty enumerable if 'this' is not a collection property or the collection type is incompatible.

member.summary: Shortcut: casts 'this' to EntityCollectionProperty.

member.name: T:TrackableEntities.Common.INavigationPropertyInspector
member.summary:
If an entity wishes to provide information about its properties in a non-standard way, then it must implement this interface.
Possible application: return null for uninitialized lazy-loaded properties instead of getting the property value thus triggerring the unwanted LoadProperty call.

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.Common.INavigationPropertyInspector.GetNavigationProperties
member.summary: Return navigation properties of an entity.

member.summary: Interface implemented by entities that are change-tracked.

member.name: P:TrackableEntities.ITrackable.TrackingState
member.summary: Change-tracking state of an entity.

member.name: P:TrackableEntities.ITrackable.ModifiedProperties
member.summary: Properties on an entity that have been modified.

member.name: T:TrackableEntities.Common.ObjectVisitationHelper
member.summary: This class facilitates proper checking for circular references when iterating the graph nodes.

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.Common.ObjectVisitationHelper.EnsureCreated(TrackableEntities.Common.ObjectVisitationHelper@)
member.summary: Helper method which initializes the given reference to ObjectVisitationHelper if it is null.

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.Common.ObjectVisitationHelper.#ctor(System.Object)
member.summary: The collection will contain a single object or will be initialized empty if no/null object is provided.

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.Common.ObjectVisitationHelper.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer{System.Object})
member.summary: Initializes an empty collection with custom equality comparer.

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.Common.ObjectVisitationHelper.Clone
member.summary: Creates a shallow copy of self

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.Common.ObjectVisitationHelper.TryVisit(System.Object)
member.summary: Checks if the given graph node has already been visited (is contained in the collection) If not, then the object will be visited straight away, otherwise NOP and return false. An object to be visited

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.Common.ObjectVisitationHelper.IsVisited(System.Object)
member.summary: Checks if the given graph node has already been visited (is contained in the collection) An object to be checked

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.Common.ObjectVisitationHelper.FindVisited(System.Object)
member.summary: Finds a visited object which matches the given object by the current EqualityComparer An object to be found

member.summary: Extension methods for entities that implement ITrackable.

member.summary: Set tracking state to Unchanged on an entity and its child collections.

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.Common.TrackableExtensions.AcceptChanges(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{TrackableEntities.ITrackable})

member.name: T:TrackableEntities.Common.TrackableExtensions.DefaultNavigationPropertyInspector
member.summary: Default implementation of INavigationPropertyInspector used if an entity doesn't provide its own implementation. DefaultNavigationPropertyInspector simply loops over all entity properties and yields those, whose values are either ITrackable or IEnumerable<ITrackable>.

member.name: T:TrackableEntities.TrackingState
member.summary: Change-tracking state of an entity.

member.name: F:TrackableEntities.TrackingState.Unchanged
member.summary: Existing entity that has not been modified.

member.name: F:TrackableEntities.TrackingState.Added
member.summary: Newly created entity.

member.name: F:TrackableEntities.TrackingState.Modified
member.summary: Existing entity that has been modified.

member.name: F:TrackableEntities.TrackingState.Deleted
member.summary: Existing entity that has been marked as deleted.
